attributes.action: Abolish plans to build on green field sites untill all brown field sites are exhausted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current threat to build on green belt land has increased with the Prime Ministers intention to build millions of new homes in the next 20 years. The need to use brown field sites must be made paramount to preserve our heritage and countryside from becoming 'paved' over. In nottinghamshire alone there are currently 700 empty council properties. These need to be used first in conjunction with brown field sites.
